text: Hagi mago kevu vahe'ma mani'naza vahera tevefi zamavare'na ufre'na, tevefima silvama kreno eri agru hiankna nehu'na, golima tevefi kreno'ma eri zogiankna hugahue. Ana hanuge'za zamagra nagri nagi ahe'za nunamuna nehanage'na nunamuzmia antahi'na nona huzmante'na, Nagri vahe mani'naze hu'na nehanuge'za, zamagra hu'za Ra Anumzamo'a, tagri Anumza mani'ne hu'za hugahaze.
